isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000i and 9000i - SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - DESCRIPTION - OPTIONAL SLEEPER MOUNTED RADIO CONTROLS (08REK)

svcproc.title: OPTIONAL SLEEPER MOUNTED RADIO CONTROLS (08REK)
svcproc.para: The radio controls mounted in sleeper control panel; includes band select, station seek (up & down), alarm, volume, power switches, and LCD panel with amber (backlight), and VOL button, SEEK/TUNE button, BAND MODE button, SEL button with amber (LED), and PWR button with red (LED).
